about_the_game:
In Nferium Taskforce, you become an unlikely agent: an agile and fearless black cat, a member of the secret organization KR9. Your mission is to investigate and confront the forces manipulating a natural entity, causing supernatural phenomena and devastating climate disasters.

Explore a world full of mysteries, connect the clues, and uncover the true culprits behind the chaos threatening nature. Each discovery brings you closer to the truth behind this dark plot, but also brings new dangers and challenges.

Game Features:

Metroidvania-style exploration: Discover interconnected areas filled with secrets, challenges, and unlockable paths.

Dynamic and strategic combat: Use sharp-clawed melee attacks and choose up to three customizable abilities to tailor your playstyle. Available abilities cover categories such as Attacks, Defense, Support, Summons, Magic Weapons, and Mobility, offering unique combinations for each challenge.

Engaging and investigative narrative: Connect the clues to identify those responsible for the natural imbalance and uncover the plot behind the manipulation of the entity.

Rich and immersive environments: Travel through diverse, detailed environments full of life and mystery, reflecting the impacts of chaos.
